headline: Why Are EPAM (EPAM) Shares Soaring Today
summary: Shares of digital engineering services company EPAM Systems (NYSE:EPAM) jumped 8% in the afternoon session after the company announced a new stock repurchase program of up to $1 billion.

raw.headline: Why Are EPAM (EPAM) Shares Soaring Today
raw.summary: Shares of digital engineering services company EPAM Systems (NYSE:EPAM) jumped 8% in the afternoon session after the company announced a new stock repurchase program of up to $1 billion.

headline: EPAM Announces New $1B Share Repurchase Program
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company, today announced that its Board of Directors has authorized a new stock repurchase program of up to $1 billion of the Company's outstanding common stock, par value $0.001 per share.

raw.headline: EPAM Announces New $1B Share Repurchase Program
raw.summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company, today announced that its Board of Directors has authorized a new stock repurchase program of up to $1 billion of the Company's outstanding common stock, par value $0.001 per share.
